metadata.title: CVE-2020-13934 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An h2c direct connection to Apache Tomcat 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.0-M6, 9.0.0.M5to 9.0.36 and 8.5.1 to 8.5.56 did not release the HTTP/1.1 processor afterthe upgrade to HTTP/2. If a sufficient number of such requests were made,an OutOfMemoryException could occur leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: tomcat6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
